Title: As a new user I would like to register for the platform
Acceptance Criteria:
• Must have unique email 
  • Must have unique nickname
  • Must have password

Title: As a user, I would like to be able to log out of the platform
Acceptance Criteria:
-Provide the user a button to log out
-User is brought back to login screen

Title: As a user, I would like to be able to log into the platform
Acceptance Criteria:
-Users must be able to log in using email & password
-Email and password must match a user in the database
-User capability will be limited until logged in

Title: As a user, I would like to be able to unregister from the platform
Acceptance Criteria:
-Once unregistered, user can't login
-User won't show up in searches anymore
-Can't be invited to a match
-All open games will be forfeited
-Other players can't view their profile

Title: As a player, I would like to create a new match
Acceptance Criteria: Must be able to play multiple matches async

Title: As a player, I would like to be able to accept invitations to matches
Acceptance Criteria:
-Once invitation is accepted user can is brought into the match
-Match board is initialized
-Challenger receives message indicating match invitation has been accepted

Title: As a player, I would like to be able to reject invitations to matches
Acceptance Criteria: Send notification of rejection

Title: As a player, I would like to be able to quit a match.
Acceptance Criteria:
• Abandon match 
  • Add abandoned match to history or note match has been abandoned

Title: As a user, I would like to be able to view my profile
Acceptance Criteria:
• User must be registered. 
  • View Match history 
  • What else is in user profile? 
  • Can view others profiles? Yes

Title: As a player, I want to play Legan chess
Acceptance Criteria:
• Follows Legan chess rules
    • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legan_chess
    • https://brainking.com/en/GameRules?tp=70
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7HdUkGNVURk
  • System determines who makes first move
  • Players can only make moves on their turn
  • Game doesn't start until enough players have joined
  • State of match is saved

Title: As a player, I want to exit a match to resume later
Acceptance Criteria:
-player can exit match
-match state is saved

Title: As a player, I want to resume a previously started match
Acceptance Criteria:
-Player can view current state of match
-Player can rejoin match in progress

Title: As a player, I want to be notified about the outcome of a match
Acceptance Criteria:
-Both players messages upon match completion
-Match status updated in player history

Implement API for adding a registered user
Create service/repository to retrieve match state
Service/repo to save state of match
Create UI for accepting a match invitation
create reject button that deactivates the invitation
Report a game concession that updates player stats
Create tab or window for profile
Request player info when profile page loads
Create React views for Match Selection
Create React View for Log In & Registration
Add search capability to match creation UI
Create service for accepting a match invitation
Alter the King's moves to avoid being put in check
Determine if a player is in check
Determine legal moves to take a king out of check (All pieces)
Service to check for a piece's legal moves
